node.title: Friday Download: Wiki Shares Lil Me Deluxe Bundle
node.content:
The NYC-based rapper releases an expanded edition of his acclaimed solo debut, featuring a new video, bonus track, lyric sheets, and more.

In December, Ratking’s Wiki released Lil Me: an 18-track collection that captures New York circa now: grime, decay and regeneration, the sound of a city that’s slipping away. Lil Me is a love/hate letter to a lost place, layered over terse, noise-influenced beats.

Today, we’ve partnered with Wiki to share a deluxe edition of the record, including a new video for Crib Tax, bonus track, lyric sheets, and a 20% off coupon for the new Wiki Flag tee. Cop the Bundle here.

Wiki: Lil Me Deluxe Bundle

Instant Download / Stream

01 Crib Tax: Live From the Crib (Video) *exclusive

02 Hate is Earned (Audio) *exclusive download

03 Lil Me Digital Booklet (Art)

04 Lil Me Wiki Lyric Book (Art)

Email Unlock

01 Crib Tax: Live From the Crib (Video) *exclusive

02 Hate is Earned (Audio) *exclusive download

03 Lil Me Digital Booklet (Art)

04 Lil Me Lyric Sheet (Art)

05 Lil Me Album (Audio)

06 20% Off Wiki Flag Tee (Discount) *eclusive

Photography: Andrew Kass
